question: Which of the following was the commander of the Golconda forces who fought the Mughals at the risk of his life?
explanation: Mir Muhammad Ibrahim, the commander in chief of Abul Hasan joined hands with the Mughals which resulted in the surrendering of the Sultan. It was only Abdur Razzak Lari, the commander of the Golconda forces who fought the Mughals at the risk of his life.
